author: Laszlo Papp
message: Wow, that is one of the amazing KDE apps. Thank you for your effort put into it!

author: Thomas Monjalon
message: Thanks a lot Aurélien. Gwenview is one of my favourite application.

author: Bidinou
message: Thanks again, Aurélien ! Gwenview is one of the pieces of software that make KDE shine. I've been using it for almost 10 years :) Please let us know if the new maintainer blogs about it somewhere !
